description: Try our easy to follow Banana Breakfast Smoothie With Berries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frappé,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Banana,High fibre,Soy free,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Banana Breakfast Smoothie With Berries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Chill two serving glasses in freezer.
Place all ingredients into a blender, and blend until smooth.

Pour into cold serving glasses. Tip 1: Freeze your chopped-up fruit beforehand, or add extra ice to make your smoothie extra refreshing. Tip 2: Pop a sliced banana onto your morning Weet-Bix and kick-start your day. After all, a healthy breakfast boosts both your brain and your body for the day ahead. And it’ll even help you make better food choices later in the day.
